timelineItems.title: Design Phase
timelineItems.description: The team works on the design specifications and first mockups.
details: User experience workshops and feedback sessions

timelineItems.title: Development Phase
timelineItems.description: Developers start coding, focusing on core functionalities first.
details: Integration of backend and frontend components

timelineItems.title: Launch & Optimization
timelineItems.description: The project is ready for production deployment.

timelineItems.title: Infrastructure Update
timelineItems.description: Migrating to cloud-based infrastructure for better scalability.

timelineItems.title: AI Integration
timelineItems.description: Implementing AI-powered features to enhance user experience.

timelineItems.title: Mobile App Launch
timelineItems.description: Releasing native mobile applications for iOS and Android.

timelineItems.title: Global Expansion
timelineItems.description: Expanding services to new markets and regions worldwide.

timelineItems.title: Enterprise Features
timelineItems.description: Introducing advanced features for enterprise clients.

timelineItems.title: Community Building
timelineItems.description: Creating a thriving community around the platform.
